short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test out your click reaction time with our simple and easy reaction time test from ClickingTests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How good are your reflexes? Find out today with our free and easy to use game!

With the click of 3 buttons you will have your reaction time and can take the test as many times as you desire.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Click the initial game area upon loading
2. The box will turn red, wait for it to turn green, this can take 1-6 seconds
3. Once the screen is green click the game area once!
4. Review your reaction time and click anywhere to take the test again

Try to beat your scores and share it with your friends to compete and see who has the quickest reaction time.
